trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged> event occurs when the user changes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem> that is selected in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged> evento ocorre quando o usuário altera a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem> que está selecionado em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse tipo.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar relatórios sobre vários eventos ou eventos que ocorrem com frequência, considere substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> com <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou anexar a mensagem como um multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> named `PropertyGrid1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> chamado `PropertyGrid1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.SelectedGridItemChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: The previously selected grid item.
trans-unit.target: O item da grade selecionado anteriormente.

trans-unit.source: The newly selected grid item.
trans-unit.target: O item na grade recém-selecionado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectedGridItemChangedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectedGridItemChangedEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the newly selected <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" /> recém-selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />.
trans-unit.target: O novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />.

trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" /> selecionado anteriormente.

trans-unit.source: The old <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" /> antigo.

trans-unit.source: This can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser <see langword="null" />.
